options.name: Natural Weaponry
options.description: Gain +1 Damage to Crushing Weapons and you can Smith Crushing Weapons with Treated Wood in place of Steel Ingots.

options.name: Tracker
options.description: Gain +1 Search. Additionally, you can spend 10 Minutes examining an Area with a Radius of 20 Units to accurately determine what Beasts or Monsters passed through within the last day as well as acquiring their tracks.

options.name: Action [Daily] : One with Nature
options.description: After ending a Full Rest in Wilderness, gain Temporary Health equal to [Level]d4 that expire after your next Full Rest.

options.name: Proven Explorer
options.description: Become Good at Wilderness and learn a non-Magical Language

options.name: Reaction : Endurant Nature
options.description: In response to being forced to make a Resilience or Resist Check, add 1d6 to the Roll.

options.name: Healthy Living
options.description: Whenever consume an Object that restores Health, such as a healing potion or food, gain extra Health equal to your Wilderness Modifier.
